Her employer has decided she wants to put in an outdoor pool at the health spa so a construction firm begins digging and soon makes a grisly discovery…a human bone.  A homicide detective is called in as it is soon discovered that there are multiple victims and they have not died natural deaths even though they did die some time ago.  The detective has heard about how Tess solved her first mystery and asks for her help on this case as she can get the inside scoop as a worker on the grounds where the bodies were discovered.  Then, another body is discovered in this mass grave; however, this body has been recently killed.As Tess continues to ask questions to discover the identity of the serial killer, she also is dealing with raising her young daughter, the decline in health of her dear friend Miranda, her husband accepting a new job and the uncertainty of whether she still has a job at the spa or not.  Her questions soon put her in the sights of the killer.I just love the whole Spencer family!  Nikki Jo and Roger are so generous with their time and finances and love.  Thomas is such a great example of a strong Christian husband.  Tess is growing in her faith walk with God.  I liked the incorporation of the You Tube videos on different methods of escaping various confinements.  I am definitely looking forward to the next book in the series!  These are books that are going on my “keeper” shelf for sure!

No man is an island” and for that matter neither is a woman.  In this book, you’ll discover the richness relationships can bring and the pain too.  At the beginning of each chapter is a quote, some of which will truly tug your heart maybe causing you to pause before reading further as happened with me.I started the book on a late afternoon and read till the very end early in the morning hours.  What types of stories keep you reading?  Sometimes for me it’s the draw of a favorite author, or wondering what story lies behind the cover, or maybe even a continuation of a pervious novel published.  I am not sure that I can pinpoint one reason for staying up reading till the last page in Crazy Little Thing Called Love other than it was magnetic.The main two characters rush off during their high school spring break to get married on the spur of the moment.  Then readers find out that not too long afterwards they get a divorce.  What is so appealing is the journey we read of these two people who are drawn to each other almost a decade later and the surprise they find of that truth after no communication in many years.The ending will really grab your heart as the message is extremely powerful.  I continue to discover this author’s gift of telling a romantic tale that delves deeper into the heart of human beings.  I loved how forgiveness was a strong theme and learning to turn back to God when a couple of the characters learned they had strayed.Best of all is the truth shared that any relationship takes work be that in granting forgiveness, showing mercy, prayer, or pursuing the heart of God or another person.  The other person may be a family member, friend, acquaintance, spouse, or neighbor.  Whoever it is a commitment to God comes first in order for any human relationship to grow.  Love is a crazy thing; we never know when it might be shown right there in front of our face.  I wouldn’t miss the journey for anything!

Tracie Peterson is a favorite author of mine from way back when I read her series of stories set in Alaska.  There is romance in Refining Fire, but what is more captivating is the faith exhibited by one young woman named Abrianna.  Abrianna could be referred to as a spit-fire of a woman, who has deep convictions based on the Word of God.  Now occasionally she gets herself into trouble, but her impulsiveness at times brings out the desire to act in the hearts of others.Militine Scott is a young lady who lives at the Madison Bridal School with no living relatives.  She is woman fraught with nightmares and questions.  Militine is afraid to get near any one person for fear of being hurt, but especially men due to the abuse she suffered at the hands of her earthly father.  Militine seems like her character is a little bit skeptic with a whole lot of seeking.  I think that is probably true of many real people who have suffered abuse of all kinds.Militine’s life is ordered and she tends to erect walls around her heart; she fears that if anyone knows her secrets they will abandon her in a heartbeat.  As I read further into the tale, it was enjoyable to watch the change that slowly came into the heart of this young woman.  Militine is not impulsive like Abrianna, but she sticks close to her side and ventures into many escapades that are dangerous.Tracie Peterson’s writing is captivating because it isn’t all romance nor is the ending wrapped up nice and neat in a tidy bow.  There is action, adventure, questions expressed externally by characters and contemplated internally and not always easy to answer.  Throughout the book the author has the characters point to God whether they understand how God or even why God is allowing experiences to come their way.  I liked how answers weren’t always quick or spoken without any thought.  If her characters did not know the answers to inquiries, they shared their personal experiences or pointed to the Bible.  At times they even said they didn’t have the answers to some of the questions raised by other characters and isn’t that the truth for real people?I hope you enjoy reading Refining Fire as much as I did and will share it with someone you know who loves a good story!

These are awesome Converse. So unique! The colors are beautiful and even nicer than what they appear in the photo. I was hoping they wouldn't look patriotic and they don't. Ivory soles, chocolate brown tongues and laces, burnt orange, tan, cream and vintage black designs. They remind me of a bandana. I wear a 9 in women's and a 7 in men's Converse. These fit a little on the big side compared to Converse that are meant for women. I have a bit more room in the toe in these than in my other pair of low tops, but not so much that It's a problem. Can't believe I got these for less than $50! What a great deal. Super happy!

Love this lip balm! I've been looking for a lip balm with sunscreen protection that doesn't feel waxy, sticky, heavy, or taste bad and this fits the bill. I got the Acai one, and the scent is so subtle and nice and dissipates a few minutes after applying. This balm is hydrating and isn't sticky, thankfully. I like it so much that I ordered another to add to a friend's birthday gift because she is addicted to lip balms and Chapstick and I know she'll like how this feels. The added antioxidant benefits from the Acai are an added bonus to keep lips looking young and protected from free-radicals. You can't go wrong with this. I'd choose this over the waxy feeling of Burt's Bees any day. Well worth the extra few bucks for a great balm.
Great patch. Good quality and looks nice. Didn't receive the free gift though. Oh well. Worth the wait anyhow. Will look great on the intended jacket. Who doesn't need a Pink Floyd patch?

A bit disappointed. Patch is larger than anticipated and is really thin. The only embroidery is the outline and the white. The entirety of the red portion is thin, cheap feeling felt that is scratchy/rough to the touch. Not what I expected since the patch in the photo is obviously all embroidered. Yes, it was inexpensive so I can't really complain, but I'm going to have to find another for the intended purpose bc this isn't going to work for me.

If you love KMFDM and love patches, you need this. Like another reviewer, I had this same patch back in the day and was so happy to find another. Very high quality patch with really tight and sturdy embroidering. This patch isn't flat like cheaper patches. The letters are nice and raised, giving it a lot of texture. As with all iron on patches, place a thin towel over the patch when you're ironing on to prevent discoloration to the design. Don't rub the iron back and forth either, use moderate pressure and press down in 3 second intervals all over patch moving iron to different spots each time you lift the iron up, paying special attention to corners. Flip the towel up to check patch's adhesion periodically as you work. That glue can get very hot, so be careful touching it to check it.Throw back love!

These boots are okay, but not what I had in mind. They look okay but they are very stiff. The insoles are hard and flat and uncomfortable. I'd put inserts in them if I were keeping them. I know they're synthetic but these boots are extremely hot. My feet were dying for them to come off 20 mins after trying them on. I wouldn't recommend hiking in them at all. These are merely fashion boots and aren't practical for any kind of physical activity. If you know anything about how boots are supposed to fit for hiking purposes, these are not going to give you the support needed and could lead to injury. Not only that but when stepping they crease at the toe in a way that's indicative of synthetic shoes. They do run large. I normally wear a 9 and took others advice, and ordered an 8.5. I could have even gone with an 8, but it doesn't matter since these are going back. Couldn't help but try them since they were so affordable, but in the long run the price reflects the quality, so keep that in mind.

I don't like this tank at all. I have ordered tons of Bear Dance tanks over the past few years and this is the first time I've been disappointed.  The tank in the photo looks like your average muscle tank, even though the description does say it's cropped it doesn't really look very cropped in the photo. Well, it really is cropped. I always order Large's in Bear Dance tanks, but this one fits differently and is actually very large. It's supposed to be flowy, but it is so wide that it just makes everything too open, if that makes sense. The way this tank's armholes are cut makes them fall all the way in the front and shows half of the cup part of my bra. It's very unflattering and creates a very boxy silhouette. I don't have a very long torso, so the cropped length of this tank actually makes me look stumpy. This might be better suited for a very petite person who doesn't need to wear a bra and who has a longer torso.

So good. I've gotten so annoyed by people ringing my bell during the day trying to get me to sign up for something. My dog freaks out, but he's tiny and ineffective.These solicitors are persistent, too. Sometimes they'll stand there for 5-7 minutes ringing, waiting. Knocking. Waiting. Repeat. I end up yelling at them and then I feel bad.So, I got this. This adorable, seemingly well constructed little sign.My boyfriend thinks it's a bit rude, and I said well, it's much nicer than me telling them to go....well.... you get the drift.It looks great, and adheres securely and solidly on the stucco (ugh) where the doorbell is. I was a bit concerned that it wouldn't sit flush against it (if it happened to actually stick), but luckily it does and rather securely. I was in a bit of a rush to get this up, as you can imagine, and I placed this just a bit off center to the bell. I tried to move it and it didn't budge.It's a perfect size, too. Small enough to scoot in nicely at or around your door without much disruption, and big enough to be noticed when decending upon it.I can't wait to see if no one rings my bell!

I'm on the fence with this one. No doubt, it smells fantastic and the packaging is amazing (obviously). It is very moisturizing, but it leaves my skin greasier than normal in the morning. It's very thick and creamy and you only need a very small amount.I'm 32, and I have combo skin that is prone to breakouts. This really didn't do much other than moisturize. It hasn't broken me out (yet), but I don't see any real benefit using this over anything else. It's just a very moisturizing moisturizer, so I'm sure it would be good for extra dry skin. Probably best for a teen with dry skin just starting out using skincare. Might try it again in the winter when my skin gets a bit dry. Doesn't absorb completely, so it's definitely a moisturizer for the evening. You don't want to attempt using this under makeup, it'll slide right off.

This shirt was a surprise. I bought an XL and it's about the size of a Woman's S/M. The material is soft, but is very comfortable. The sleeves are kinda boxy, but that's the style. It's rather short, but I wouldn't say it's cropped. It's about the length of most 90's tees (if you didn't wear junior's clothing in the 90's, sorry). The print is bold and perfect (I love eyes) and it fits me pretty well. It's definitely a very casual tee. I suppose I could dress it up with some black skinny jeans, black strappy heels, and a thick gold chain collar necklace. Good value for the price. Very pleased.

I love this shirt, it just runs small and is very tight fitting. The fabric is comfortable, soft and is also on the sheer side. It's also quite low cut. For reference I'm 137 lbs. atm, a 34C, 5'6 and a Large is quite form fitting on me. It's an interesting color too, not quite black, not quite brown. And, most of all, David Bowie is on your tummy, so I don't really have that much to complain about, lol. I knew it was a junior's tee, and I was taking a chance. Maybe I'll feel more comfortable in it when I haven't been home sick sitting on my bum for the past two weeks.

I've had these shoes for 3 years so far, and they really hold up well. They still look new. Granted,I'm only wear them if I'm going on walks in my hilly neighborhood because they're not so great for working out in because they are heavier than a typical athletic shoe. They are on the bulkier side and take some getting used to if you've never worn toning/rocking shoes. I tripped in these shoes a couple of times when I first u got them just because I wasn't used to walking in them. When you step in these, you're forced to walk heel to toe and the rocking motion sort of springs you forward. You can really feel the toning action in your legs after a long walk, but mostly in the calves. I have tendon damage in my right ankle from a bad roll that never healed properly, and these shoes will cause some fatigue to that ankle, however, I also feel like they help strengthen that ankle (because I'm using muscles in these shoes I don't typically use when wearing other shoes or sneakers), and they provide a lot of stability to it while I'm walking. The arch is incredibly comfortable. Lots of kooshy, but firm, support.These shoes are a worthwhile investment and I've been very happy with these over the last 3 years. They may not be the prettiest shoes ever, but as far as these type of shoes go, this is the nicest looking pair I've come across.

Needed to replace zipper pulls on a pair of leather boots with a full back zipper, and this lace was perfect. A little more chocolate in color than I hoped, but still matches nicely. Soft, stretchy, yet super sturdy. Thicker than I envisioned but still thin enough that it fit into the zipper loops nicely. Looks even nicer than the leather lace zipper pulls the boots came with (which snapped bc they were so thin). Will find more uses for the rest of the lace. Definitely will buy from Springfield Leather Co. in the future!

I love these sponges. They're soft and gentle, yet they have an exfoliating effect and leave my skin really clean and bright, without feeling dry or over exfoliated. When I use this sponge consistently, I notice a dramatic improvement in reduction of blackheads and oil. I have combination skin that is prone to breakouts, and I have larger pores on and around my nose. This sponge really helps at getting them cleaned out, making tightening them up a lot easier. Cleansers also easily rinse out. This sponge is a must have for me. I really should buy two at a time or something so I always have one on hand when it needs replacing. I have the Luna Mini, but I find that I like this sponge better, so I rarely even use it anymore.

I really like this little nose ring. It's very fragile though, so I'd be careful trying to bend it to tighten it in any way. It looks great on and is more of a gunmetal than a shiny silver. It's also a great size and doesn't look over the top, even though it's quite detailed and ornate looking. It's really lightweight as well, so it's comfortable to wear.
These bindis are beautiful! They're so sparkly and the detail is exquisite! Not flimsy or cheap looking in the least. Really happy with these!

Bought this for a birthday gift for a dear friend who loves Snoopy and figurines in general. It's such a unique style and is very artsy, I know she is just going to love it! It's bigger than I expected, which was a pleasant surprise. I love that it looks like carved wood. I couldn't have found a better gift and can't wait for her to open it!

This top is so comfy and soft! I ordered a Large because I wanted it to fit more loosely and it does, but I could have probably gone with a Medium because it is truly on the oversized side on me. For reference I'm 135 lbs, a 34C, and 5'6 and it falls mid thigh.It's really flowy as well as stretchy, and hangs wonderfully. It is somewhat sheer in the off white area, so I recommend wearing a lined white or nude bra with it. Thinking of buying another in another color but trying a Medium.It's truly is a great feminine looking raglan and I'm pretty darn smitten with it!

This is exactly what I wanted! This is a great, lightweight, distressed looking hoodie. Fits fantastically! Soft, lightweight material with a slight stretch to it.The cuffs have the coolest thumb holes that I've ever seen! They are perfectly placed and comfortable, unlike some thumb holes in other hoodies or thermals that are just awkward and uncomfortable. These thumb holes are smoothly sewn and placed. This hoodie is not going to keep you warm by any means, however, it's perfect for Cali evenings! This hoodie is also long which is awesome! On my 5'6 frame the Medium comes to the top of my thighs and almost completely covers my butt. The puckered ruching at the zipper gives a lot of texture, especially with the distressing. It looks so cool. The only thing I don't really like is the hoodie cord, but that's easily removed and replaced with something a little cooler looking, maybe some kind of a leather cord. The cord that comes on the hoodie is your basic woven nylon cheapie cord. Don't let that deter you though, because honestly, the coolness of this hoodie completely outweighs that one minor downfall. Oh, also, the zipper is plastic. Eh, you gotta pick and choose your battles. For the price though, this hoodie is just SO cool! It looks like something from the costuming dept on Lost or The 100 (which is exactly what I was looking for aesthetic wise), or even an All Saints Spitalfields brand hoodie! If this came in some more dark colors, like an olive or brown, I'd buy it immediately!The Medium fits me perfectly, not too tight but not baggy either. For reference I'm 135 lbs, and a 34C.Love love love!!

This bolo/lariat necklace is awesome!! I didn't know what to expect, and it completely surprised me when I received it and saw how well made and cool looking it is! I ordered the black and the bolo tie is dove grey enamel with a black enamel center and is just about the size of a 50 cent coin. The soft leather cord is somewhat thicker than expected, but is in proportion of the hardware and beads, and is of good quality. It has a chunkier look and feel to it, without being masculine. It has a good weight to it too, it doesn't feel flimsy or like it's going to break. The bolo tie is adjustable, so you can choose where you prefer it. It's a perfect length as well. The bottom of the fringed ends falls right above the belly button on me, so it is quite long.I'm really REALLY happy with this purchase! I'd definitely buy from this brand again in the future, and am even considering buying this necklace in other colors or as gifts for my more boho friends and holding onto them for Christmas. Loooove!!!

I have a thing for eyes and I collect things that have eyes on them whether it's jewelry, clothes, art etc (I even have an eye tattoo on my forearm), so when I saw this little silver ring I had to have it. It is small and delicate looking, but that's just what I was looking for. Most of my eye jewelry are statement pieces, and I really wanted something more feminine and subtle for my collection. This fits the bill! The CZ's are small but very sparkly and it catches the light beautifully! It's super comfortable to wear and fits true to size. Really happy with this purchase and the price is stellar for the quality! It definitely looks like a more expensive ring.

Like these a lot. Very comfortable, lightweight and fit true to size. The faux leather is soft and doesn't dig into your feet. I had to punch another hole into the straps because even at the tightest, the buckles weren't tight enough, but I have pretty skinny ankles. Wish I could find them in black in a 9 because the white is proving difficult to pair clothing with. They don't really look great with skinny jeans, but they look particularly cute with tank and babydoll dresses. Definitely a worthwhile buy.

Love these! I primarily got these to wear outside when I water my garden at night to avoid insects from crawling on my feet, especially spiders. They're so comfy though, I'll probably order another pair to wear regularly. They take a few to get used to if you're not used to walking in platform flip flops, as they feel kind of clunky at first. I haven't owned a pair like this since I was a teen, but I'm really loving how comfortable they are. Every step is cushy and the arch doesn't hurt or cause any strain. I haven't wanted to take them off! Plus, the height they give my 5'6 frame is awesome. Now, I can also wear a couple of super bells I have that are too long without having to take them up at the hem! Total win. I'm glad I chose these over some of the other brands I've had in the past that have platform flip flops. These are much more comfortable than I remember those brands being. Also, they fit true to size. I'm a true 9 and got the 9, and they fit perfectly. My heel lines up with the heel of the shoe.

I'm in love with these! They are soooo cute! Super sparkly but not in a tacky way. They look good blade up or blade down, even blade sideways going up the ear (my personal choice). For the price, they're a steal. They're a good size so they make a statement, but they're also not bulky or heavy. Such a good buy!

Jut received this necklace and am super impressed! So much nicer than I even expected. The one I received is genuine quartz because it clearly has inside cracks indicative of natural quartz vs that of lab created.The chain is a lot nicer than I expected as well. It's a super sparkly and shiny twist chain that is very feminine looking.Came much sooner than expected and was wrapped and packaged well.Super happy with my purchase and I'll likely order the amethyst.

Love it! Haven't had a bullet necklace in awhile. The last one I had (a completely different necklace and bullet mind you) came off the chain while at a club (hah). This is not a dainty or feminine necklace in any way. I like layering and balancing out it's badassness with more feminine looking pieces.The chain is really thick and is also much longer than the chain in the photo. At least, the chain that came with the one I received is. It hangs just below the breast bone. Actually, I like the length a lot, tbh. Allows for more layering options.Honestly, this bullet necklace can't be beat for the price. Quality wise it looks like it should cost at least 3x as much, so I'm pretty happy. Has a really nice weight to it but isn't uncomfortably heavy.The bullet I received is in perfect condition, no dents or scratches and is really shiny. Really great option for those who like to mix looks like I do, want to add a bit of rocker/punk/hardcore/gothness to their accessories, or for those that just prefer more masculine jewelry.Very pleased!

Another great tank by Bear Dance. Super comfortable, with a loser for through the torso. I always buy a Large in Bear Dance tNks and they fit me perfectly, relaxed but oversized. For reference I'm 135 lbs, 5'6 and wear a 34 C.The symbols look so cool, and they are printed to look like they were written with brush strokes. Here's a list of what the symbols are. From the top down: the sun, air, earth, fire, water, a wet moon (or Cheshire moon).From left to right: Pentacle, Jupiter, Venus, Earth, then the astrological symbol for Earth, Mercury, and lastly Saturn.

Super comfy, soft, and stretchy! Swings and hangs on the body perfectly. It's not really asymmetrical, it's pretty even all the way around. It is a scooped A-Line cut though to give it a cute, flowy swing. I'm 135 lbs, 5'6, 34C and I ordered a Medium and it fits perfectly, if not even a little on the loose side which is actually the way I wanted it to fit! It falls roughly 2" from my knees. Looks cute on its own with combat boots (or heels to dress it up for a casual night out), or over some cropped leggings with ankle moto boots, or even skinny jeans with some platform ankle boots. Options are truly endless. Super happy!

This is indeed fake, just like the review from Meryl says. I ordered Pretty Flamingo awhile ago and never used it.  What I received was the weird, orangey-pink color dye in the jar, just as she pictured, with no serial stamp. I could tell immediately when I opened it. The chemical smell was not that of Manic Panic. I've been using Manic Panic for years. The consistency is runnier and thin. The security seal is cheap and hard to remove, unlike MP's. I did a strand test anyway, cuz I wanted to see what the results would be with this. After leaving it sit overnight on a test cutting of my dirty blonde color hair, the result was not even noticeable. If I kind of moved it around in the light it had a creamcicle like tinge to it, but definitely was not Pink Flamingo, which I have used before. The results were completely different.I suggest ordering from a reputable retailer if you must order online (Manic Panic's website for instance, or go into a retail shop like Sally's or an alternative lifestyle store/goth/punk store).It completely bewilders me why they would go to so much trouble faking packaging and dye for a $10 hair dye. The profit would have to be worth the trouble, so you can bet that "dye" is worth pennies, and not vegan. Judging by the smell, I wouldn't put it on my hair at all. It smells like toxic chemicals. There's almost a sting when smelling it.Don't take the chance!

No wonder this choker has so many glowing reviews, it really is awesome. The velvet choker is solid quality, for sure. It doesn't look cheap or gimmicky, it's a really nice plush velvet ribbon. The the little crescent moon is so cute, and it catches the light just right to add a bit of shine and shimmer to the look of it, not to mention it's the perfect size in proportion to the ribbon (nothing bugs me more than a tiny charm dangling from a Godzilla-sized ribbon in comparison, but I'm picky). I'm really really happy with this choker. It looks sooo cute on. You honestly cannot go wrong here.

I absolutely adore these glasses. Judging from other reviews I thought they'd be truly oversized, but they're actually not that big, for me anyway. Granted, other cat eye glasses I've tried have been smaller but cat eye glasses tend to look pinched on me. These are actually a great size and they're really comfortable and fit my face well without giving me the pinched look. The color combination looks fantastic and goes with pretty much everything. They don't feel or look cheap to me. In fact they're probably the nicest pair I've bought in a long time. I wanted something a little more current in style to go with my new shoulder length blunt bob and they really compliment my new style and are exactly what I was looking for. They could be a tad darker, but I prefer really dark glasses in general because I'm so light sensitive. All in all, these are great glasses. I've bought AJ Morgan in the past and they tend to be a brand I don't mind paying a little extra for because they hold up so well.

I bought both the pink and black. The pink I got in a Medium and the black I got in a Large. I like the look of the large better in general because it's more flowy on me than the medium, however the sleeves are really really loose. I would have preferred the sleeves on the Large to fit more like the Medium. Regardless, they are nice tops. The light stripe is more of a light oatmeal. Not white. These tops are also rather sheer so you may want to wear a nude bra with them or layer a tank underneath. The material is nice but if you're sensitive to scratchy materials this top might not be for you. I wouldn't say it's extremely scratchy, but it's enough that I noticed it. It's not too bad because the weight of the material is really light so it is bearable, it's just not the softest top ever. I bought these tops primarily because the black stripe one is an exactly like a top Aria (Lucy Hale) wore on the current season of PLL, and I really liked the look. It might even be the top she wore, but I don't know if it is since they didn't show the back and the back of this top has buttons down the center. I agree with the other review about sizing up if you want the oversized flowy fit. Just be aware that the sleeves will also be much larger.

I bought this as a birthday present for my dad. He died suddenly last week, before it arrived. He would have loved it. I decided to keep it and wear it as a night shirt. It's a nice looking shirt. Comfy and vintage looking. I wish I had been able to give it to him. :'(

I love love Big Star jeans. I have 8 pairs (now) of the Alex fit and for some reason these fit a whole size larger. I bought the normal size I wear in Big Star which is a 30, and usually they fit like a glove without much breathing room because most of their jeans don't have stretch, but these definitely are more of a 31. Mind you they aren't stretchy but they did stretch out while wearing. As soon as I opened them I thought they looked too big. As soon as I put them on I realized I was right and they were a lot looser than I expected around the waist, butt and thigh, but I didn't think they'd stretch out this much while wearing so I figured it wasn't that big of a deal.  After 8 hours of wear they are baggy and falling down. I love the color and the print so much (FYI they are a faded black with a faded rose print which looks awesome compared to a super bright print) I just wish they fit like my other pairs. Hopefully they'll do some shrinking in the wash. They're so big that I'm even going to wash them in hot water and dry them on high. Seriously. They're that much bigger. If a 29 was available I'd so send them back, but unfortunately that size is sold out.

I can't tell you how blown away by this piece I was as I unwrapped it and saw what my new Celestite looked like!! It FAR exceeds my expectations in every way. It's absolutely stunning! I couldn't have asked for anything better!!! I am ecstatic about it. It's a great weight, quite heavy, it's larger than I even anticipated yet feels great holding it in the palm of my hand. It's like this piece was meant for me. It's so sparkly and has so much depth and the way that it's opened up is incredible. I do however feel that Crystal Allies should use foam sheets for packaging because that paper doesn't not provide much protection in that size of a box at all. A tiny piece did pop off the side but even though that happened it did not destroy or alter my specimen in any horrible way. If anything the piece that fell off can be turned into a piece of jewelry that will always connect me to my lovely specimen when it is at home. I'm uploading some photos of my piece. The photos don't even do it the justice it deserves because it's still 10x prettier in person. I will definitely be ordering from this company in the future because if this is any indicator, their specimens are superb! (Just wrap your pieces better guys).

This is awesome, hands down. The colors are definitely darker/more intense in person. The oranges are really bright orange, the purples are plum. Has more blues than it appears online. At first I was concerned that it wasn't what I wanted but upon further examination it actually is perfect. I can't decide if I want to keep it on the wall above the bed, or if I want to sew up the top and make it a curtain. I might just buy another for this purpose. I could even cut it down the middle and make two panels or drape it from the ceiling for a meditation/hookah corner. The possibilities are endless. I think I've seen one almost exactly like it an Urban Outfitters catalog/look book that was double the price. It's not overly feminine color wise so I think my boyfriend will approve (we'll see when he gets home from work, haha). I was trying to find a happy medium between what I wanted and what I think he'd like. It doesn't have any hanging loops, which I was aware of before ordering, but two normal flat gold thumb tacks are enough to hold it up on the wall and support its weight. It's a decent weight cotton, not too flimsy but if used as a curtain certainly won't completely block out light. In fact, the reason I am considering making it into a curtain is because it looks quite beautiful with the light coming through it. The colors are diffused by the light and they glow. Creates a very mystical looking space, even flush against the wall. I bought the Large and it is huge and fits the 12 foot wide wall behind the bed perfectly, with a bit of room on either side. I'd take a picture but our room is a disaster since I'm redoing closets atm.All in all, this is a fabulous tapestry/hanging/blanket/curtain, and I wouldn't hesitate to order another for another purpose or area in our home.

**Update**After washing these do soften up and they do shrink a bit, mostly in length and around the chest.Definitely better than expected. In fact, I like it so much I just ordered another before writing this review (as I'm wearing the tank in question btw). These remind me of vintage tanks I commandeered from my dad that he'd get at biker bars up and down the coast in the 70's and 80's. Same kind of cut and style. Oversized, but not excessively so (honestly the model photos are atrocious and it looks better on irl). Material isn't clingly. The cotton isn't very soft when it comes but you know, as you wash it over the years it gets softer and softer so it's no big deal.I bought a Large, based on other reviews for how I wanted it to fit, all the while crossing my fingers hoping that this wasn't just another thing I'm going to have to send back due to poor online shopping impulse control and finding sizing way off base. Luckily, it fits exactly how I pictured/wanted it to fit. Nice and loose, but not so much that the chest and armholes are unflattering. For reference I'm 136 lbs, 34C and I wear anything between a 6-10 depending on brand and fit. I'm 5'6 and this tank falls just below my crotch. A perfect length I must say. It's not too tunic-y but it's just teetering on the edge. I'm super picky about length, and this is perfect. Might buy some more and use some vintage iron on transfers I have. Definitely a good tank for a decent price.

Even though these were a little misshapen out of the packaging, I was able to bend them back into a more circular shape. They are still very cute. The red stone is more translucent in person than they appear in the photo, and the black is simply unnoticeable while on. I feel like the post is a bit too long, but once pushed flush against my lobe they look fine. I suppose if you have "fatter" ear lobes you won't find this to be a problem. A little pricey for what they are, IMO, but still happy to own them. Nice and subtle but very boho looking and they'll go without just about everything.

I have a 7 yr old terrier/chihuahua mix (Ivan) who has always been weird about food. He even quarters and sections off his dry food in equal portions. He is a rescue from the South Central pound in LA, so I'm assuming it has to do with his previous experience. I know he was taken away from the original owners due to abuse and his second owner abandoned him. Needless to say he's had a hard life until I adopted him.He's the kind of dog that will just stare at his food for a good 10-15 minutes before eating it. He'll nudge it, lick the bowl, but wont actually eat for what seems like forever. I've tried other raised feeders, but they've scared him for whatever reason and he won't go near them. The only way I've been able to get him to eat for years is by propping his dish up on an incline with a pillow.This Monday he had major oral surgery and had 18 teeth removed (it was a shock) and I was looking for a new dish to better accommodate his poor lil swollen mouth. Nothing really stood out until I saw this, this awesomeness of a dish/feeder. I ordered it and crossed my fingers that he wouldn't be intimidated by it.I received it today, much sooner than expected, and hoped for the best as I prepared his food. He took to it right away!!! He didn't stare at it, he didn't lick the bowl, he ate it all up!! It was SO apparent that this feeder was SO much easier for him! The angle and size is absolutely PERFECT! I was worried it would be too low, but it's not at all! I sat there and watched him eat and couldn't believe how quickly he understood it. He didn't have to bend his head around trying to get into corners and no food was left behind!This dish/feeder is heaven sent! I'm almost ashamed I didn't think of it lol!Now I will be ordering one for my 15 yr old cat!The ONLY way this could be even better is if replacement bowls were available on the off chance something happens to this one. Buying a whole new feeder to replace a bowl is simply ludicrous. You guys really need to get on that because I'm sure that really deters possible buyers, especially considering the price. I have to say though that it IS worth every darn penny!The dish itself is quite sturdy feeling so hopefully nothing happens to it. I'm just going to handle it with care and hand wash it.I'd recommend this feeder to every pet owner, although it won't work for large dogs. Size options would also be available for people with big dogs because it's simply fantastic!

This necklace looks so much better in person. A bit on the heavier side and the clasp is a bit sharp, but overall it's a great necklace. I do wish it wrapped around a bit more, but I'm picky lol. Definitely a steal for the price as I've seen similar necklaces for much much more. It's the perfect boho necklace for summer!

This is very good makeup. It's not great makeup, but it has a large palette with many varieties, and most would enjoy it.Pros:- Like the more tame colors. They spread easily, and work pretty well.- It's a bit powdery, so not as good as better makeup. For the price, however, it is very competitive.Cons:- The sparkly ones are a bit too sparkly. If you're 21 and going out - they'd be a better fit than for a career woman.Overall, good, but not as good as Urban Decay.

My 4 year old got this and loves it. He loves his new tank top shirt, and the bright, bright green of the other shirt.Pros:- Fits to size. He's 4 and his 3T fits him just fine (he always wears 3T)- Good quality materials on the shirts and shorts, so I'm not worried about them falling apart- Bright colors, cool designsCons:- None

My wife and I bake a lot of cupcakes. A LOT. These baking cups work as well as any, and for a reasonable price. They have excellent, well printed designs, hold up well, and don't stick any more than others.I would not suggest using them without a cupcake pan. Though the description states it is possible, we haven't had any luck with them holding up.

My 4 year old loves RC cars. Loves them. However, he drives them like Charlie Sheen after a night on the town. This one is still tough to drive, but he can handle it if he doesn't just pull the trigger. We have a blast driving together and seeing how he can beat daddy on a regular basis!Pros:- It's fun and (relatively) easy to drive the cars. Not like old slot systems that tether you to the table, this uses technology and science to give you free reign.- The cars can be used in full RC mode, so we can go elsewhere and play on the floor.- Pretty good build quality, especially for the price. I'm not concerned that a couple crashes or a dropped controller will end the fun.Cons:- Uses lots of batteries. Lots. Get rechargeables and keep them charged.- The track is kind of flimsy. I keep it far, far away from my 2 year old.

I was provided this item at a significant discount in exchange for an honest review.This is an excellent light set. As the days wind down and darkness encroaches on the eastern shore, I find myself traveling to work in less and less light. We have a few (read many) ignorant drivers around here, so all the indication that I exist I can get is good. This light really helps.Pros:- Love that it came with 2 batteries, and the option to use AAA. That's much better than the other light I had that only has one internal charging battery, and always seems to be dead at the worst possible time.- Good rear light with strobe and steady features.Cons:- None really.

Effectiveness? Not much greater than Edge, Barbasol, or whatever else your dad used.Smell? Infinitely better.Feel? Yep, better.Price? Whoa, nelly. It's..not cheap.Overall, it does work for a non-lathering, non foaming shaving cream. That said, I've found with these types of cream it is more common to use quite a bit, and at this price point, that does become expensive.If you like to pamper yourself with a high quality, good smelling, effective product, this is it. If you just want to get the job done, raid dad's medicine cabinet (avoid the blue pills, trust me)

Odd description. By the time your kid is in size 6 diapers, won't they...most definitely be moving? Further, aren't kids this big usually putting on their own diapers sometimes...and who changes a child standing? I guess we're just weird.That said, these are pretty good diapers, at a good price.

I have a very thick beard, and need to shave every day. Used to use Gillette / Schick products, but they got to expensive, so I went to an internet company to buy them, and those work great.These, however, do not work great. They're slightly better than the traditional yellow and white disposable throwaway razors, but not by much. I tried using one of these for a handful of shaves, and by shave 3 or 4 it was pulling the hair as much as cutting it. I'm not impressed.They also felt like the blade is at a weird angle to the handle so I had to hold it differently than other razors. I wouldn't get these again.

This is a lovely gift candle, and should be, since it is rather expensive. You won't want this for a daily burner, but to impress someone with a one-time gift, it's quite nice.Pros:- Very attractively packaged in black, with everything set perfectly in its place.- It smells VERY strong. You can smell it across the room even when unlit.- Lasted quite a while so far, with minimal sputtering or other problems. It's quite a nice candle.Cons:- It smells VERY strong. If you're sensitive to smells or perfume, do NOT buy this.

Don't kid yourself, Hersheys. These are king size candy bars, just sliced into a few pieces. They aren't an outrageous combination of nuts and chocolate, or whatever your marketing copywriter put together.Pros:- I do like that my family can share one/several, and instead of having to break them up, they're pre-cut.- Typical Hershey's taste - you know what to expectCons:- Typical Hershey's taste - you know what to expect- They're a whole bunch of calories. 330 / 370 calories is an awful lot for a snack.- I did find that the chocolate ones got melty extremely fast, since you're holding them. My 4 year old was a mess.

Got this for blocking off aisles in our warehouse to ensure employees don't walk where forklifts are supposed to go. It works well, at a very reasonable price.Pros:- Easy to cut with a pair of lineman pliers.- Rolls off the reel simply and easily - I did it all by myselfCons:- None. 60 feet doesn't last as long as you would think, however.

Ok, it's not a huge savings over just boiling water, but it does save some time, and it's certainly less dishes. I threw together some quick pasta using leftover sauce tonight.Toss the pasta in a big pan, cover with water, heat for about 10-12 minutes, then stir in the sauce. That's it. It was ready to go, and tasted just like normal pasta. No one in our family could tell the difference.I think it would make excellent pasta style casseroles too - cook it on the stovetop, cover it with cheese, and throw it in the oven for a quick 20-30 minute dish. Overall, I'm impressed and would buy it again.

A couple years ago the first book in the series was offered as a free Kindle book. Assassin's Apprentice, I believe. I made the excellent/foolish mistake of taking it for free. I've been stuck on the series ever since, including a misguided tour down the Rain Wilds in the dragon series, only to come back to Fitz and the Fool for another round after perceived retirement.I thoroughly enjoyed this book from start to finish - spending an entire flight reading it, then some more when landing, much to the annoyance of my wife as we started our vacation. I'm happy to say that we lost a lot of Bee's exposition from the first book, replaced with Fitz's story and his gut reactions to coming back to his old life. However, the character has developed nuance and experience that shows throughout his decisions and makes him a more rounded character.Overall, excellent book and highly recommended, much more so than Book I of the Fitz and the Fool.

For shredding power and quality of shred, this would be five stars. Unfortunately, the cheap plastic housing that will inevitably break, and feels quite flimsy for this price level, knocks it down one star.Pros:- Nice small dice shredding. Better than all comparable price models I have tested.- Handles credit cards, multiple sheets, staples all with easy. No blocking or jamming up.- Easy to tell when on and off due to a bright light, and little concern that it will be left on for little ones to get into.Cons:- Cheap feeling housing. It's very thin plastic that doesn't feel it will stand the test of time. Like a $5 trash can feeling.- The casters are so tiny. Almost pointless, really.

I'm very pleased. I've used Cascade packs, and they work fine, but they're more expensive - and don't do as well as these Finish packs. We currently rent, and our landlord bought the cheapest dishwasher possible. It doesn't do much on its own. These, however, work wonders on everything in the dishwasher, from easy stuff to caked on grime.Pros:- They don't tear. I got so tired of leaked Cascade packs, and these are made of heavier duty film and won't tear. You can also pick them up with wet hands without them falling apart.- Clean great without leaving stuff around or on the ground.Cons:- They do look like candy. Keep them away from the kids.

I received this item for a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.Very happy with this mat compared to others. It's nice and thick, padded enough to do some moves neither my wife nor I felt good doing before, and holds in place after a quick wash.Pros:- No stank of weird plastic material- After a quick wipe down, it works great - no slipping or sliding.- It's thick enough that moves don't destroy your tailbone quite as bad as other yoga mats.Cons:- It is a bit thick rolled up, especially compared to others. Worth it for the additional padding.

I've got 30 days max to write a review of this for the Vine program, but I can sum up my feelings thus far, and I don't expect them to change. This item is a disappointment, and a waste of a couple hundred dollars.Pros:- It is small size, especially the emitter part, so you can hit small areas.- Ease of setup, charging, and good instructions. They spent their time ensuring these parts worked well.Cons:- It's disappointingly weak. While my laser removal at a laser center clinic hurt a bunch, and was marginal, this is a small sting by comparison. I don't see it working unless it's roasting those hairs!- The form factor. It looks like...well, you know. Couldn't they have hired a designer to make it look less phallic?

I went through a couple years of very expensive laser hair removal. It was marginally effective. I thought this might be a good touch up/improvement solution. Given the feeling and the process, I'm doubtful.Pros:- Easy to use and understand. I figured it out in just a few minutes.- It's not very painful. This is also a con. The industrial laser they used at the clinic hurt a ton. It was kind of effective. It was a lot more powerful. See where I'm going here?Cons:- Haven't noticed any difference. It has only been a treatment, but there's no impact. Given how little it hurts compared to the commercial version, I'm doubtful of its efficacy.

If you want your baby to smell like the Pampers when you just open them - Dreft is the thing for you. Made the mistake of washing my clothes in it the other day, and I smelled like my 2 year old for hours and hours. Hoo-eey. Not what I was shooting for.That said, I'm certain many people actually DO enjoy that smell.Pros:- Easy pour, easy to see lines on the cap, and nothing shady so I waste a bunch of product (here's looking at you, Tide, with your dark cap)- Smells like we've come to expect a baby to smell. Well, the good version of what we expect.Cons:- Works OK. I don't notice any difference between this and the cheap stuff (Purex). It cleans the clothes adequately, and if there are tough stains, BOOM, Oxiclean fixes it.

At a distance, yes, it's quite pretty. Up close, it is very light in weight and feels quite cheap.Pros:- Looks nice from a distance- Good length on the chainCons:- The packaging is terrible. It kind of looks nice, but when we opened it, the necklace was twisted upon itself multiple times and looked terrible.- It feels cheap. It's very lightweight, and doesn't seem like it will last long.

I teach a lot of classes for people through work, and these are my standby. On flipcharts, they work perfect. As a plus, they also smell excellent.I can't comment on how washable they are - been lucky enough not to get myself dirty.

I usually use a bar of soap. Manly man style. That's how my face gets washed. Lava, for extra exfoliation.I figured I'd try this stuff to see how it works. A couple pumps later, a bit of a lather, and I'm going for it. Washing my face with face wash.First impressions: Meh, this smells kind of gross. Would love some scent, especially as I wipe it under my nose. Also, little lather, which after reading the bottle is the point. OK. It pumps well out of the bottle, too, none of this thirty pumps for a drop stuff.I apply it. It goes on clean, rinses off clean, and my face feels and looks clean. Great.Overall, it keeps my face clean. I'm in my 30s, so I don't worry about acne and stuff. I just want to wash the sweat and dirt away. If it smelled better, I'd give it five stars. As-is, four stars.

We should be thankful, and show gratitude. It doesn't sound earth-shattering, but somehow in our society, it is. The book follows through yet another "grand experiment," this time on showing gratitude and the impact it has on the author's life.It turns out positive. Seeing what benefits we have, and acknowledging them, has a positive impact. This is much more important than getting more stuff. Good read, if a bit straightforward.

I run a large manufacturing plant, and have 2 kids. This has kept iPads safe from both my maintenance guys working hard, and my kids. Bravo!Pros:- Easy to install, easy to use, and easy to remove when needed- Great coverage. It has protected the iPad from drops, slips, trips, and falls, over and over again.Cons:- None. It is a bit expensive, I guess.

First, for the price, I'm not impressed. It's plain white material, nothing fancy, and this is neither soft nor durable like many of the other sets of crib sheets we own. I wouldn't buy this for myself, and certainly wouldn't give one as a gift to others. It's just not nice enough.Second, bumpers, really? We still haven't given up that thing? They're not safe and you don't need them. The end.Pros:- It does come with a lot of stuff in the container.- They're all OK quality, not great, not poor. I wouldn't hesitate to put them with my children, but I wouldn't go out of my way to do so, either.Cons:- Cheap packaging material. It looks rough and cheap. Not good gift material by any stretch.- It's overall not great. For the price, you're better off spending a bit more and getting individuals of each item, rather than spending more for this.

- I received this item at a significant discount in exchange for my honest review -I have a couple Silpat mats that do the same function, but must be treated with kid gloves at all times as they're made of pixie dust or glass or something. These are similar, at a much lower price, more durable, and do the same thing. Props to Kitchen Ethos for a good product.Pros:- Love the three sizes. If I'm heating up something quick for the kids, I don't have to dirty a whole dish, or a half sheet sized silicon mat.- Not very heat conductive. I just grab them with my bare hands from the oven - they don't get that hot.Cons:- None yet. After a week or so of constant use, I haven't seen any issues.

- I received this item at a significant discount in exchange for my honest review -I'm a frequent traveler. Lots of overnight flights, some in coach, some in business class, and some between two big guys who are really drunk. I've had plenty of experience with sleep masks, earplugs, and the like. This is on the better end. It's not as nice as the $30 one I got from Brookstone at the airport, but it is leaps and bounds above the ones you'll find at the airport gift shop for $15.Pros:- Velcro closure, not elastic, so it doesn't smoosh your face all night- Nice, thick material that prevents the light completelyCons:- It could be cushier and softer. My Brookstone one is, but again, it was almost 3x the price.

I'm very impressed. I have been using standard 3M shipping tape for my packages, and find myself using 4-5 strips every time, even for the most basic package. This Gorilla tape is extra, extra wide, and super strong. I have no worries about my boxes ripping open or things falling apart - even for heavy packages.Highly recommended.

I was so thrilled with this book, just in time for springtime. Lemons bring bright summertime flavors and thoughts, and reflect the light eating I'd love to do all summer long. This book, especially, is an excellent little cookbook, with a balance of sweet and savory items. I was worried the savory would be an afterthought, but lemon really stands out in many of the dishes. It does make me wish I had a lemon tree, however!Pros:- Bright, colorful photos, and delicious recipesCons:- It's pretty short, but the price reflects that. Besides, I'd rather have 50 good recipes than 300 mediocre ones.

Imagine my shock when a huge box showed up, and I scratched my head trying to remember what was coming. It was pretty heavy, too! It couldn't have been those chairs; they'll be cheap, flimsy, and fall apart immediately, won't they?Guess not! These chairs are bright, sturdy (though I wouldn't let an adult sit on them), and great for our kids' play area.Pros:- One piece design cleans up easily and will help keep them from falling apart- Sturdy enough that I expect my 3 year old to be able to climb and walk on them without issue- Bright, colorful, and stack easily. Great for the play area and so the kids can have friends over.- Better overall quality than most IKEA furniture in a similar size. I'd buy these over IKEA any day.Cons:- None, particularly.

We've had a Ducane (gifted to parents) and a Weber Genesis (gifted to brother), and now this grill. At a much lower price point than the Genesis, it's comparable in many ways, and has left me very pleased.Assembly: From start to finish, it took my wife and I about an hour to assemble. The directions were good and clear.Startup: Works great. No messing around trying to light it for hours - it just lights. That's a big win compared to cheaper grills that make you fight forever to get them lit.Performance: Gets as hot as expected. Cooks great and doesn't lose heat or use too much propane. Overall we're very pleased with this.

These are very attractive, heavy duty, and prevent virtually all light from coming through. As opposed to some others, they hang well, don't bunch or crease horribly, and don't have that stiff plastic feel. I'm very pleased with this item and will look at other designs for our home in the future.

The manufacturer provided me a free product for my unbiased review.I'm very pleased with this device. We have a lack of convenient outlets in our home, and a multitude of i-devices - 3 iPads, 2 phones, and a couple iPods. It's borderline ridiculous.This device is great, however. Instead of needing multiple power bricks and an outlet strip, this one thing does the job. I can charge 2 iPads and an iPhone simultaneously, without a bit of an issue. Good build quality, and it is balanced well enough that it doesn't just fall out of the wall like some devices do.Overall, very pleased with the design and functionality. It's small enough to easily go in my briefcase for a trip, too.

Both our children love this book. My 4 year old boy loves hearing about ninjas, and his 2 year old sister loves the pretty pictures and little things hidden in a lot of the illustrations. They're done in a very unique style, and stand out. Not only that, but the story is cute, with a good message about practicing.Pros:- Story about the virtue of practice, with a few Japanese terms thrown in for good measure- Well done on the art front. After too many similar books, this one really stands out.- Both kids love the hiding dragon on a few of the pages. They spot him every time.Cons:- None. As a parent I enjoy reading this book to the kids, which is rare, since some are so...terrible.

It's a fine fragrance, but neither my wife nor I find it that pleasant. Given the high price of $45 an ounce, or less per ounce in the larger sizes, I expect more.If you're a fan of the fragrance, then by all means, but it's cheaper elsewhere and we've found other scents to be a better value.

Had a number of these for our 3 year old boy, and now our almost 2 girl. They're pretty flexible in sizing, so they fit the bigger girl and the smaller boy, both. Overall, a very good product, but they're pull-ups, so -1 star for the inevitable poop and disgusting removal process, plus the relatively high price for something essentially the same as a regular diaper.Pros:- Cute designs on all of them - we use them unisex as they're kids and they don't care that much.Cons:- Pretty pricy for night time usage compared to normal night time diapers. As they often don't know to get up in the middle of the night, I've found this to be a waste of pennies per night.

Our daughter is almost 2, and goes to bed around 8 pm. We try to wind down starting around 7, and we're working on potty training - but normal pull ups just don't make it through the night. These, however, work great.Pros:- Plenty in a package. Not the incredible shrinking diaper package we typically deal with.- They last through the night. We were using Huggies overnight diapers, and these hold about as much. No waking up with soaked through clothing, thank goodness. I don't miss that at all. I do enough laundry.Cons:- I don't know why the girls' ones need to be princesses and the boys something else. Why not just make diapers? They're 2 years old.

In a long line of whitening products comes Colgate's entry into the market - Optic White Platinum toothpaste. To be honest, after a few days, I notice absolutely nothing different - certainly not the "whiter in 3 days" claimed on the box.Pros:- It doesn't taste horrible, and spreads easily onto a toothbrushCons:- Don't notice any visible change in my teeth. They weren't stained to start with, but they didn't get any better from what I could see.- It's very expensive.- Kind of funky taste - not great, not terrible, just a bit off. It's certainly not a refreshing minty flavor.

This passed all the major towel tests:1. It was quality feeling. Not like those cheap ones - it's soft enough to wipe a kid's face.2. It actually absorbs water. Some of the cheap (and some of the expensive) ones out there don't absorb anything. What's the point?3. It didn't shrink after a dry much. Kept in very good shape and remained rectangular.Good quality, good towel.

My almost 4 year old loves these. He can have a couple and treats them just like candy (which is mixed). None of the bad stuff like iron so if he got into them, he wouldn't get sick.Pros:- Good flavors. Taste like gummy candy.Cons:- Recommended 4 per day. That's pretty expensive for kids vitamins, the efficacy of which has little to no proof.For what they are, a good item.

This is such an important read for anyone who's recently engaged or a newlywed. Marriage can be more difficult than most of us anticipate, and it's good to be as prepared as possible to give your marriage the best chance at getting off on the right foot. This book is well-written, well-organized, and has lots of practical tips and advice. Recommended.

Tim and Erin are two of the most relateable, engaging characters I've encountered recently (even though, on the surface, I have little in common with them), and I thoroughly enjoyed following them on their journey. This novel was a good one and I plan to look for more books from this Mr. Pasqual.

So many Atkins recipes, I will never run out. Atkins has given me great results, but it can be hard to find recipes that taste good and are satisfying for me, a former carb addict. This book's recipes are so filling and so tasty (at least the ones I've tried). Really recommend it.

This book has it all. It's exciting, engaging, AND sexy. This author is one of the best romance authors I've encountered at constructing a plot that could exist as a standalone book, with the love scenes as a very steamy added bonus. Loved this and couldn't recommend it enough.

I've read a couple of other books from this author and they're always great. Plot moves quickly, love scenes are so sexy, and characters are actually very well-developed, which is unusual for this genre. This one didn't disappoint. Finished it in one sitting and loved it.
Loved this quick, sexy story. Well-written with a great plot and characters. Recommended.

I've had an amazon associates account for a couple of years actually but am just starting to use it. Not much money coming in quite yet, but steadily growing, especially with the help of this book. I've seen a real change thanks to the advice here. Recommended.
Sexy story that I read all in one sitting. I actually loved the plot as well as the love scenes. No trace of cheesiness, just superb writing.
This has been a huge help. House training can be tedious and frustrating but there are ways to make it easier on us and puppy, and this book does a great job at showing how. Really grateful.

I've been reading a lot about emotional intelligence lately and how important it is for professional and personal success. This book is one of my favorites so far. Well-written, well-organized, practical advice. Recommended.

I consider myself a Christian, but I think we can all learn things from Buddhist teachings. It's a fascinating religion and I get a lot out of some of the practices. I really enjoyed this book--it's perfect for someone who's just learning about Buddhism.

What an interesting book. It never occurred to me that there could be strategy to playing the lottery, but it definitely makes sense that there are ways to improve your odds using statistics and probabilities. If you're going to play the lottery anyway, you might as well read this book to give you a better shot at winning.

I love cowboy stories--there's something so sexy and masculine about a cowboy (not that I've ever met a real one). This is one of my favorite stories recently, very steamy and sexy with a great plot and characters. I pretty much read it from cover to cover without stopping.

My husband and I have what I consider to be a happy, healthy marriage, but no relationship is perfect, so I like to read books like this every once in a while to check in with myself and assess our marriage. This book has lots of great advice and things that had never occurred to me before. I plan to refer back to this every so often.

I have a few online businesses in addition to my day job, and I'm always looking for new ways to make extra money online (the easier the better). I like that this book provides PAINLESS ways to make money online. That's key for me. I don't want to put in an extra 40 hours in addition to what I already work. I got some good ideas from this book that I plan to try out over the next few months. Recommended.

I work with a lot of different personalities, some more difficult than others, and this book has been great about giving an overview of the most common personality disorders, how to recognize them, and how to deal with them. I think personality disorders are much more common than we think. I'd recommend this book to anyone, we all encounter people like this.

Some people think that yoga and weight loss don't go hand in hand but I've personally found the opposite to be true. Yoga does so much for how I feel physically and mentally that other healthy habits just seem to follow naturally. I love to read about the benefits of yoga to keep me inspired to practice, and this is one of my favorite resources lately. Tons of info that's well-written and well-organized.

I love to use natural remedies whenever possible, and this is one of the most comprehensive herbal remedy resources I've found. Seriously everything you could need, from how to use herbs to heal insomnia, flu, arthritis, to skin care to hair treatments. A goldmine of info and highly recommended.
I'm really into infused water lately and this bottle was just what I was looking for. I really like that it's big enough to be able to use plenty of fruit and enough water to last me a while.

I'm a lawyer, so I need to be able to think analytically, if not necessarily scientifically. This book is a great reminder that we can train our brains to think a certain way and also that we need to be careful to stay mentally sharp as we get older. Enjoyed reading this.

I was really surprised at how big this bag is! I was expecting a smaller bag, more of a lunch sized tote.This tote bag is 16.5 x 5.5 x 15.8 inches!I have decided I will use this bag for one of two things. Either a beach bag/oversized day trip bag or to fill with my yarn, hooks and looms for a nice portable crafting bag! Then I can take my knitting/crocheting with me in the car!The tote bag from Lightaccents is very well made. The fabric is a canvas type material. I chose the blue and white print.It has a loop over button enclosure, and a big front open pocket.Inside you will find 3 sectioned compartments on the one side of the bag, and a big section on the other side of the bag. As well as the middle of the tote that is open for you to fill wit your goodies.The bottom of the tote has little silver feet, so the bag remains clean as you set it on the carpet/ground next to you.The handles are the perfect length and this is very easy to carry. Excellent workmanship.I'm honored to have been chosen to test this item and I agreed to give my feedback on how the tote worked for me.So excited to be able to put this to great use. Would make an excellent gift, with many pattern styles/colors available.

I am very impressed with the Coleman CM1008 folding knife.The knife has both a Stone Wash Stainless Steel Blade as well as a Stone Wash handle. It almost reminds me of a Camo handle and the blade is a darker type material.This knife is easy to open and measures about 7.5 inches from tip to the end of handle.Closed the knife is 4.25 inches.The blade is very sharp and ready for use.Very easy to have in your pocket and carry with you. You can take advantage of the back clip to clip to your belt or jeans, or even inside a coat pocket. I think a nice leather knife holster would fit this piece nicely.Very nice quality. Quality you would expect from Coleman.Great for camping, or just having a bigger knife on your person.I would recommend this knife. Would make a great gift as well.I received this for testing purposes and agreed to give my opinion on how it worked for me.

I love gifting food items like this Holiday Celebration mix tower.The towered boxes had a bright, cheerful, Holiday design. The words were easy to read and the boxes were high quality.Each box had a different confection inside. Each were wrapped in their own sealed plastic bag.There was Cookie Christmas Bites on the top level, Double Crisp Chocolate Christmas Discs and  Yogurt Covered Cranberries in the middle, and Christmas tree-shaped pretzels in the bottom box, covered in a sweet white coating with red & green drizzle.The candies were all fresh and delicious.This is the First of Christmas in my house right now, since it's a week before Thanksgiving, and my Daughter was thrilled when she came home and saw this boxed set!That's the other nice thing about this set. You can also use the boxes for other gifts, or just keep them stacked for a nice holiday decoration!Pistachio gifts will be the Company I look for when buying these types of items. It was a big hit with my family!I bought this at a discounted price and agreed to give my opinion of the product.High quality treats and display!

This 12X Zoom Telephoto Lens kit for my IPhone 6 is Amazing.If you do not have a digital SLR camera this might be what you are looking for.The product is a 4X-12X Zoom Telephoto Lens/ Fish Eye Lens/ 2 in 1 10X Macro & 0.65X Wide Angle Lens kit with a tripod and different phone cases to fit your phone so you are able to use this Lens set up. I'm assuming they fit-  iPhone6s/6s plus/ 6 plus/6/5S/5 phones.This is a very high quality set up, and pretty advanced for a cell phone. To be able to take these kind of pictures with this lens is just an amazing thought.I had a bit of trouble getting the ring around the big lens. And had trouble keeping the lens stabilized, it kept wanting to move downward. It's probably user error, as this is something my husband usually helps me with, and he's out of town for the week, so I thought I'd give it a try by myself.I took a picture before the lens looking at some of my Grandson's magnets on my refrigerator, and after I attached the lens. Both from the same distance. It's amazing what the 12X zoom can do.My only thought is to be able to use this you would either have to have it on a countertop or  something at eye level to be able to stand and look through the phone and zoom lens. Or you would have to be laying on the ground as the tripod is only about 3 inches tall. You could use this without the tripod but it would be heavy for the case, in my opinion.This set up also comes with a clip on attachment to be able to screw on the fish eye lens or the macro lens, and attach it right to the phone, easy on easy off.I'm honored to have been chosen to test this lens kit from Daots. Thank you for letting me give my opinion on how it worked for me. It really is a very high quality product.

I was very excited to order this for my 2 year old Grandson.He loves to do puzzles. I like the fact that this is a wooden type puzzle. Much more durable and they tend to last the longest in my opinion.Each piece has it's slot with a numeric numeral as well as the number of items below the number. They are all on the 1 puzzle piece, so there are only 10 pieces to this puzzle.Bright colors, well made. There's a little finger slot to easily remove the piece from it's slot.The puzzle measures  11.8 x 8.9 x 0.2 inchesThe price point is great for a wooden puzzle.I received this for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review.

The RFID pouch for the back of the cell phone by Zero Grid appears well made out of a dual-layer reinforced lycra fabric with a soft microfiber backing.This comes with a 3M sticky back tape pad that appears to hold up to 300lbs, as it's stamped on the peel off back of the tape.The ad page states this will accommodate up to 8 cards, but I do not feel like mine would stretch out that much. I would say 3-4 cards maximum.The cards fit snug in the pouch.I did not like the idea of taping something like this to my Iphone 6, so I will not be doing that. I may put it on a cheap case, but definitely not my Phone.I received this for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review.

I love the elegant look of this bracelet by Mondaynoon.I chose the baby blue and white steel design. This features Swarovski crystals as well.Very pretty and it fit very well. I ordered this for my niece, and thought she would just love it!The enclosure is just a loop in the cording that hooks on the metal side of the bracelet.One thing I did notice was a really bad smell, like mildew. I'm hoping it's just the cord material, and I hope it will air out before Christmas.This looks well made, and comes in a clear pouch and has a black velvet drawstring storage bag.I received this for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review.

If you are looking for a high quality Crochet hook set this one is for you!I bought this for my youngest daughter and myself. I have not crocheted in years, and my oldest just began making a baby blanket for her 2nd child. So I figured this would give my youngest and I something to do, and to relearn a lost art, so to speak.What I love about this LiLiSew 11 piece set is the cushioned handles! With me getting older and my grip not being what it use to, these are very easy for me to hold onto. They do not slip and my hands do not cramp! This is great for me!This 11 piece set comes with:B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L US sized hooks.OR measured in MM as:2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8This also comes with 10 additional stitch markers so you know where you left off, and helps prevent stitch unravel.I love the bright colors. The hooks are made out of aluminum so they are very light weight!This would be a great gift for a beginner or experienced crocheter who will appreciate less hand fatigue!I bought these at a discounted price to test and agreed to give my opinion of how they worked for me.

These clip on lens kits are all the rage right now.My daughter has been having a blast playing with my set.You will receive 3 clip on lenses-180 Degree Fisheye Lens0.36X Wide Angle Lens20X Macro LensVery easy to clip on the phone with or without case on.The Macro lens is a bit tricky. At first I did not think it was working properly. You literally need to hold the lens up to the item you are trying to photograph. make the lens rim touch the item and pull back just enough to focus.I was amazed at what I captured!The are just plain fun to use.They can be used on a wide variety of phones. I would say they are pretty universal.I used this on my Iphone 6.I love that the Mpow brand also included the lens caps to help protect these lenses while being stored in the little black storage case, or if you just throw them in a camera bag, you know they will be protected and ready to use.Great design. Each lens is clearly marked and also stamped on the clip.I received these for testing purposes in exchange for my honest opinion.Great gift idea.

I love the look of the Colored Ceramic knives.This set of 4 knives and a vegetable peeler come on a cardboard sleeve and encased in a clear clamshell.Each knife has a plastic colored handle and a colored sheath.The blades are white in color. Looks are deceiving as when I pulled the sheath off I could not tell if the knife was sharp.These knives are very sharp and cut very well and quickly and effortlessly!In this set of knives from Surpah's you will receive one of each:3" paring knife4" fruit knife5" utility knife6" Santoku knifeVegetable peelerThey are very ergonomic and easy for me to hold and use. These blades will not rust!Very fashionable in any kitchen. Makes cooking fun!Very easy to clean. I hand wash all my knives for longevity. I would not place in dishwasher, as I did not see any washing instructions.Avoid cutting on marble, stone or glass surfaces - Use with a plastic or wooden cutting boardFor discolorations not removed by normal washing, wash the blade only in a mild bleach solutionUse ceramic knife sharpener only - do not sharpen with ordinary knife sharpenerI received this set of knives for testing purposes in exchange for my opinion on how they worked for me in my home.

I love the quality of Buttons & Bows Men's Bamboo Crew socks.These socks fit a Men's sock size 7-9, so they are smaller than the normal 10-13 Men's size.The Bamboo socks feel more like a nylon type material and are very soft to the touch, and soft and comfortable to wear.I wore these, and actually these could be considered unisex.The socks have about a 1 inch cuff on the leg part of the sock. They fit tight to my leg.I chose the black socks.The benefit from the Bamboo socks are they are made from 70% bamboo, to fight the bacteria that causes infections and foul odors. Breathable and silky, the socks keep feet dry all day and are strong and stretchy thanks to the addition of 26% acrylic & 4% spandex.I am very impressed with the high quality socks from this company.I was chosen to test this product in exchange for my honest review.

This Rose headband in the off white color was very pretty! It also came with a wristlet.The headband has little flowers all around and woven with the green floral tape to cover the metallic band.The band is adjustable and you are able to shape it to your head size. There are ribbons the you can untie and readjust as necessary.The wristlet is made the same way. It look more like a letter C with ribbon. The flowers are the same as in the headband, so it's a matching set.Very well made.This would be perfect for a wedding, or just a cute accent for summertime.Adults and children alike would love this set.Very well made, I tried to get a close up of the flowers in my photos.I received this for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review.

WOW! I have never been more impressed with a full sized headphone's quality and sound before.The Sently  LS-4430 Thorx headphones are very high quality headphones.From the look of the box, to un-boxing you can tell these are a high quality item.The headphones are collapsible, as well as adjustable via the Stainless steel headband.They come with a Tangle free flat 3.5 mm audio cable that also has a built in microphone inline. Great for traveling.I like to listen to my music when I clean my house and with these headphones I could do that, and also never miss a call from my hubby!
